title: Excel Sheet Column Title - Math - Easy - LeetCode
Sqrt(x) (newtons method) - Math - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Implement int sqrt(int x). Compute and return the square root of x, where x is guaranteed to be a non-negative integer. Since the return type is an integer, the decimal digits are truncated and only the integer part of the result is returned. Example 1: Input: 4
O

title: Palindrome Number -Math - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Determine whether an integer is a palindrome. An integer is a palindrome when it reads the same backward as forward. Example 1: Input: 121
Output: true
Example 2: Input: -121
Output: false
Explanation: From left to right, it reads -121. From right to left,

title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
content:
People come and people go, but there are some who continue to live post their physical existence. These people are human but are no less han God for their contributions to humankind. One such man is the man who knew infinity.
